softwareFormStep2.external id hint_fill:
Fill up a name or directly the id (careful, HAL ids look like 'hal-123123v1', but only the number should be provided (without 'hal-' or the version), in this case it should be '123123') to associate the software with an existing entry Wikidata.
Most general information, such as the URL of the code repository, is extracted from HAL. If the software you want to add does not have a Hal entry yet, you can create one. Find here anexample of an HAL entry
